constructor.notice: Constructor that initializes the `bool` value to the given `init_value`.

flip().notice: A message that can be called on instantiated contracts. This one flips the value of the stored `bool` from `true` to `false` and vice versa.

get().notice: Simply returns the current value of our `bool`.
